Sentencas: A novel vacuum deposition technique based on a slurry coating is proposed for the preparation of thin yttriastabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte films on a porous NiO-YSZ substrate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Dense thin YSZ electrolyte films prepared by a vacuum slurry deposition technique for SOFCs

Sentencas: The vacuum pressure not only improved the packing density of the electrolyte particles but also enhanced the bonding strength between the anode and electrolyte layers.
Titulo: Dense thin YSZ electrolyte films prepared by a vacuum slurry deposition technique for SOFCs

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of the cell prepared via vacuum deposition decreased from 1.27 to 0.89 Omega cm(2), which resulted in a remarkable increase in the peak power density from 249 to 292 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C. An anode functional layer (AFL) was also fabricated by the vacuum slurry deposition method in an attempt to increase the three-phase boundaries (TPBs) at the anode/electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Dense thin YSZ electrolyte films prepared by a vacuum slurry deposition technique for SOFCs

Sentencas: The scanning electron microscopy (SEM) images revealed that the sintered YSZ electrolyte film has a crack-free, dense and homogeneous microstructure.
Titulo: Dense thin YSZ electrolyte films prepared by a vacuum slurry deposition technique for SOFCs

Sentencas: These experimental results indicate that slurry vacuum deposition is an effective technique for producing dense thin films for SOFCs and other applications.
Titulo: Dense thin YSZ electrolyte films prepared by a vacuum slurry deposition technique for SOFCs
